item.title: India's Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps: A Disturbing Assault on Privacy and Free Speech
item.description: Blog Privacy, Free Speech, Encryption India's Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps: A Disturbing Assault on Privacy and Free Speech India's ban on encrypted messaging apps undermines privacy and free speech, setting a dangerous precedent for democracy and citizens' rights. Reading Time Mins View Views Publish Date June 27, 2023 India’s Ban on Encrypted Messaging Apps “Privacy is not a privilege, it is a fundamental right.” - Edward Snowden In a shocking move, India, once hailed as the world’s largest democracy, has taken a giant leap towards eroding privacy and stifling free speech by banning encrypted messaging apps on a massive scale.
